Consultancy services

We at Rosol Energy Pvt Ltd provide consulting services like from introducing and recommending products through cooperation proposals, cooperation in taking permits & approval, preparation of transaction documents, logistics assistance, project investment and development assistances and on-site service response, Rosol provides full service from pre-sales through after-sales needs. With more than 50 business partners and local service teams, we promise to provide professional and efficient response to all customer requests.


Our solar consulting services include
  • Solar business consultation
  • Industry and company news subscription
  • Product and service portfolio information and recommendations
  • Cooperation proposal development
  • Project investment and development assistances
  • Transaction assistance and status updates
  • Logistics status tracking
  • Installation technical assistance
  • Warranty and insurance registration
  • After-sales needs
  • Other needed services
